basic_information.scholarship_name: Academy of Contemporary Music Endowed Scholarship-NOMINATION

description: This scholarship was established in 2009 by Susan Wortham to support the ACM@UCO's students. Eligibility ACM@UCO student Requirements AWARDED BY COMMITTEE NOMINATION. Nominated student(s) will be invited to apply by the college's scholarship coordinator.

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
criteria.raw_text: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration
